menu.footnote: *All burgers may be cooked to order. Unless otherwise requested, hamburgers are cooked to an internal temperature of 155˚. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. 2000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice, but calorie needs vary. **These pies can be made with our gluten allergy-safe procedures

menuItem.item_description: Signature Mellow dough, cut into bite-sized pieces, finished with garlic butter and parmesan. Served with a side of our Pabst Blue Ribbon™ beer cheese dip, it's the perfect shareable munchie
Signature Mellow dough twisted into pretzels: Choice of garlic butter and parmesan with a side of Mellow red sauce or garlic butter and kosher salt with a side of mustard

menuItemAddon.addon_title: Add Pabst Blue Ribbon™ Beer Cheese For

menuItem.item_description: Diced tomatoes, basil and seasonings tossed in balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Topped with feta cheese and fresh basil, served on garlic toast points, and drizzled with a balsamic glaze
Three meatballs grilled with fresh mozzarella on a bed of Mellow red sauce with shaved parmesan and basil, sprinkled with breadcrumbs
French bread topped with melted mozzarella, then baked. Served with a side of Mellow red sauce

menuItemAddon.addon_title: Add Fresh Tomatoes for an Additional

menuItem.item_description: Creamy hummus served with your choice of toasted pita wedges or carrots and celery. Garnished with paprika, basil and olive oil
Fresh sautéed spinach blended with artichokes, mozzarella and parmesan in a creamy sauce topped with shaved parmesan and baked. Served with garlic toast points
Crisp double-baked wings. Choose from hot, mild, BBQ, jerk, sweet Thai chili or naked. Served with celery, carrots and your choice of ranch or bleu cheese dressing
A rich, creamy soup flavored with Burgundy wine and herbs. Topped with Italian MontAmoré®, grilled shiitake, button and portobello mushrooms, and fresh chives
Romaine and iceberg lettuce, shredded carrots, red cabbage, onions, cucumbers, green peppers, mushrooms, feta cheese, kalamata olives, roma tomatoes, pepperoncini and banana peppers
Spring mix and romaine with roma tomatoes, cucumbers, black olives and onions topped with shaved parmesan. We suggest balsamic vinaigrette with this salad
Romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing and topped with shaved parmesan and house-made croutons. Add all-natural chicken or applewood smoked bacon for an additional charge
Romaine and iceberg lettuce, shredded carrots, red cabbage, onions, cucumbers, green peppers, mushrooms, black olives, roma tomatoes, mozzarella, provolone and ham
Fresh spinach topped with dried cherries, apples, house-made candied pecans and feta cheese. Add all-natural chicken or applewood smoked bacon for an additional charge

section.section_desc: All-Natural Salad Dressings: Signature Esperanza, Herb vinaigrette, Balsamic vinaigrette, Chunky bleu cheese, Caesar, Ranch

menuItem.item_description: *Bleu cheese, Cheddar, Feta cheese, *MontAmoré®, *Mozzarella - fresh, Mozzarella - shredded, Parmesan - shaved, Provolone, Ricotta - seasoned, *Vegan cheese

Anchovies, Artichoke hearts, *Avocado, Bacon, Banana peppers, Basil, Black olives, *Candied pecans, Caramelized onions, *Chicken (all-natural grilled), Cucumbers, Diced apples, *Dried cherries, Garlic, Green olives, Green peppers, Ham, Jalapeños, Kalamata olives, Mushrooms, Onions, Pepperoncini, Pepperoni, Pineapple, Portobello mushrooms, Roasted mushroom trio, Roasted red peppers, Roma tomatoes, Salami, Spinach, *Steak, grilled (shaved all-natural ribeye), Sun-dried roasted tomatoes, Tempeh, Tofu. Our tofu, tempeh, and all-natural chicken and steak can be prepared in your choice of our sauces: BBQ, buffalo, herb vinaigrette, jerk, pesto or teriyaki

section.section_desc: Your choice of base plus three ingredients $7.99. Base choices are lettuce blend (romaine and iceberg lettuce, shredded carrots and red cabbage), romaine, spinach or spring mix. Customize to your taste with additional cheeses and fresh ingredients below for $1.49 each. *These items are so good they count as two ingredients

menuItem.item_description: Mellow red sauce and mozzarella on Mellow's crust, buttered and sprinkled with parmesan
*Bleu cheese, Cheddar, Feta cheese (GF), *MontAmoré®, Mozzarella - extra (GF), *Mozzarella - fresh, Parmesan - shaved, Provolone, Ricotta - seasoned, *Vegan cheese (GF)

Anchovies, Artichoke hearts, *Avocado, Bacon (GF), Banana peppers, Basil, Black olives (GF), Caramelized onions, *Chicken (all-natural grilled), Garlic, Green olives, Green peppers (GF), Ground beef (GF), Ham (GF), Jalapeños, Kalamata olives, Meatballs, Mushrooms (GF), Onions (GF), Pepperoncini (GF), Pepperoni (GF), Pesto swirl (GF), Pineapple, Portobello mushrooms, Roasted mushroom trio, Roasted red peppers, Roma tomatoes (GF), Salami, Sausage (GF), Spinach (GF), *Steak (grilled, shaved all-natural ribeye), Sun-dried roasted tomatoes (GF), Tempeh, Tofu. Our tofu, tempeh, and all-natural chicken and steak can be prepared in your choice of our sauces: BBQ, buffalo, herb vinaigrette, jerk, pesto or teriyaki

section.section_desc: Choice of "Classic" crust or Mellow "Thin" Crust. Customize to your taste with any of the fresh ingredients listed. Base sauce choices include olive oil & garlic, pesto (GF) and Mellow red sauce (GF). *These items are so good they count as two ingredients

menuItem.item_description: Stuffed with mozzarella, provolone and seasoned ricotta, then basted with garlic butter and sprinkled with parmesan
Spinach, mushrooms, roma tomatoes, seasoned ricotta, mozzarella and provolone
Meatball, sausage, salami, mozzarella, provolone and seasoned ricotta
Grilled, shaved all-natural ribeye steak or grilled all-natural chicken with mushrooms, onions, green peppers, seasoned ricotta, mozzarella and provolone

section.section_desc: All calzones are made with fresh Mellow dough and served with a side of Mellow red sauce. Ingredients for a calzone are priced at small pie prices

menuItem.item_description: Olive oil and garlic base with sun-dried roasted tomatoes, provolone, feta cheese, seasoned ricotta, fresh basil, mozzarella, roma tomatoes and onions
Mellow red sauce with mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, ground beef, ham, applewood smoked bacon, mushrooms, black olives, roma tomatoes, green peppers and onions. Topped with extra mozzarella

Mellow red sauce with mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, ground beef, ham and applewood smoked bacon

Mellow red sauce with mozzarella, ham, bacon, caramelized onions, pineapple and jalapeños
BBQ chicken, mozzarella, cheddar, caramelized onions and applewood smoked bacon. Finished with a BBQ sauce swirl
Mozzarella, all-natural buffalo chicken, caramelized onions and applewood smoked bacon with a swirl of buffalo sauce. Finished with a swirl of your choice of bleu cheese or ranch dressing

Olive oil and garlic base with shiitake, button and portobello mushrooms, caramelized onions, mozzarella, and MontAmoré®. Finished with a garlic aioli swirl and a spritz of black truffle oil. Garnished with fresh chives and shaved parmesan

section.section_desc: All pizzas are served as large - 8 slices, medium - 6 slices, small - 4 slices. Bakers Mellow "Thin" Crust; **These pies can be made with our gluten allergy-safe procedures. All gluten-free pizzas are served on our 10" signature gluten-free crust. Gluten-free pizzas and ingredients are priced as a small pie plus $2

menuItem.item_description: Grilled, shaved all-natural ribeye steak, onions, mushrooms, green peppers, provolone, mayo, lettuce and roma tomatoes
Seasoned meatballs in a Mellow red sauce topped with melted mozzarella
Ham, pepperoni, salami, fresh mozzarella, caramelized onions, basil, spring mix, mayo, roma tomatoes and herb vinaigrette
Seasoned avocado, onions, provolone, mayo, lettuce and roma tomatoes
Ham, applewood smoked bacon, provolone or swiss, caramelized onions, grilled mushrooms, mayo, lettuce and roma tomatoes
All-natural grilled teriyaki chicken, provolone, onions, mushrooms, green peppers, mayo, lettuce and roma tomatoes
Your choice of teriyaki tempeh or tofu with provolone, onions, mushrooms, green peppers, mayo, lettuce and roma tomatoes
8 oz. of 100% choice, all-natural black angus beef, USDA-certified from family-owned and operated Harris Ranch. Served on a grilled brioche bun with a side of roasted potatoes
Finished with swiss, caramelized onions, garlic aioli, romaine lettuce, sliced tomato and pickle chips
All BYOB burgers are dressed with lettuce, tomato, pickle and onions. Add two additional ingredients of your choice from the following list:
menuItem.item_title: *Build Your Own Burger Just the Way You like It

section.section_desc: All hoagies are served on a French roll or multigrain roll. All hoagies are served with a choice of kettle chips - malt vinegar & sea salt, jalapeño cheddar, sea salt or BBQ

menuItem.item_description: Our massive house-baked gourmet cookies. Three decadent choices: triple chocolate chunk, oatmeal raisin and peanut butter made with Reese's® Peanut Butter Cups®
No plain Jane brownie here. This one's a buttery chocolate, chewy brownie generously studded with Hershey's® Kisses milk chocolate, bittersweet and semi-sweet chocolate chunks

section.section_desc: Order any cookie or brownie as a sundae. We'll top it with all-natural vanilla bean ice cream, dark chocolate truffle sauce, house-made fresh whipped cream and an all-natural bing cherry for an additional $3

menu.title: Main Menu

section.section_desc: Each entrée is $5.50 and comes with one side and a drink

menuItem.item_description: Named for one of our loyal guests who helped us create the recipe, our signature top shelf margarita is made with premium, fresh ingredients. Featuring Patron Silver tequila, Patron Citrónge orange liqueur and our house-made fresh agave sour

A Mellow twist on a classic. Features Ketel One vodka and fresh lime syrup topped with Crabbie's Original Alcoholic Ginger Beer, which is made with the finest ginger and exotic spices for a little extra kick. Served in a traditional copper mug
A tropical treat featuring Bacardi Superior rum, fresh pineapple, house-made fresh sour, Monin coconut and fresh mint with a dash of Monin pomegranate syrup. It's five o'clock somewhere
A crisp, delicious combination of Hendrick's gin, St-Germain elderflower liqueur, fresh cucumbers, basil and our house-made agave sour
A surprising and refreshing blend of Patrón Citrónge orange liqueur and house-made sour topped with a splash of Blue Moon and served with a fresh squeeze of lemon
A true classic with a Mellow twist! We combine Woodford Reserve Kentucky Bourbon with St- Germain Elderflower liqueur, fresh lemon juice, a touch of cane sugar and a splash of sparkling water

So what goes better with handcrafted pizza than beer? Craft Beer! Here at Mellow we pride ourselves on offering a unique and diverse selection of the best brews available. From the tap to the bottle to the can, you will always find a wide variety of Craft Beer, premium imports and a little extra emphasis on your local favorites. Make no mistake, we may have amazing handcrafted cocktails and your favorite premium wines but Craft Beer is our passion, and we want to share it with you!

menu.desc: You'll only find these tasty treats at this location

All day
Play the field with our Field Green Salad. This salad features assorted gourmet lettuce, mushrooms, tomatoes, and green olives

section.section_desc: We've taken the flavors of Mellow Mushroom's kitchen and reimagined them into our Signature Sandwich Collection. Available in box lunches, assorted trays or combined with other options as a package

menuItem.item_description: choose from our signature sandwiches with your choice of kettle chips or chill out pasta salad and two small bites cookies

Choose your favorites from the collection of signature sandwiches or ask for the best-sellers. Small tray: 8 whole sandwiches cut in half; Large tray: 12 whole sandwiches cut in half. Custom tray pricing is available
keep a boardroom from becoming a bored room with a combination of: + signature sandwiches + chill out pasta salad or kettle chips + house-baked cookies and brownie bites
a meeting request you can't refuse with selections of: + signature sandwiches + caesar salad or greek salad + chill out pasta salad or kettle chips + house-baked cookies and brownie bites

section.section_desc: Choose your favorite Signature Sandwiches, Salads and Sweets by the Dozen that are bound to make any meeting more flavorful

fresh spinach, spring mix, dried cherries, apples, house-made candied pecans and feta cheese, served with balsamic vinaigrette

a classic caesar salad with crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, shaved parmesan and all-natural grilled chicken, served with caesar dressing
personal serving of our house-made chicken salad with all-natural grilled chicken, dried cherries, pecans and curry mayo on a bed of lettuce, served with carrot sticks and celery sticks
Served with dressing on the side. Trays served with garlic toast points
our house-made recipe with spiral pasta, sun-dried roasted tomatoes, fresh spinach, Portobellos, pesto, shaved parmesan tossed with our herb vinaigrette
rich, savory and creamy, topped with a roasted mushroom trio, chives and Montamoré®

section.section_desc: Pizza is what we're famous for! Every option you can imagine is available. Select from one of our specialty pies listed below, or build your own from our extensive list of premium ingredients. Please contact your local catering department or mellowmushroom.com for more info. Gluten-free options available

menuItem.item_description: 1.5-2 slices per person. Available in: 3 large pies (12-15 People), 5 large pies (20-25 People), 7 large pies (30-35 People)
2.5-3 slices per person. Available in: 4 large pies (12-15 People), 7 large pies (20-25 People), 11 large pies (30-35 People)

section.section_desc: we serve a 16" pie cut into 8 slices

menuItem.item_description: fresh sautéed spinach blended with artichokes, mozzarella and parmesan in a creamy sauce topped with shaved parmesan and baked until its warm and bubbly, served with garlic toast points
Our signature mellow dough, cut into bite-sized pieces, finished with garlic butter and parmesan. Served with a side of our pabst blue ribbon™ beer cheese dip
crisp double-baked wings in a choice of hot, mild, bbq, jerk, sweet thai chili or naked, served with your choice of ranch or bleu cheese dressing, celery and carrots
build your own bruschetta with our classic recipe of diced tomatoes, tossed with olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil and seasonings, served with garlic toast points
Creamy traditional, sweet thai chili, and pesto. Served with fresh veggies, pita, and garlic toast points

section.section_desc: Sure to please any crowd, anytime | Small (serves about 10) Large (serves about 15)

a buttery chocolate, chewy brownie with hershey's® kisses milk chocolate, bittersweet and semisweet chocolate chunks
includes ice, cups, sweeteners, and lemon
coca-cola®, diet coke®, coke zero™, sprite™
We make everything fresh just for you. Please give us 24 hours notice. Same day ordering is available with menu limitations
menuItem.item_title: We handle every catering order with the care and precision it deserves.
Our delivery drivers will be happy to set up your order at your specified location and time. A minimum order and/or delivery fee may apply.
Contact your local catering department for more details.

section.section_desc: We've taken the flavors in Mellow Mushroom's kitchen and reinvented them into catering options we know you are going to love! Our eco-friendly packaging is designed to travel to your office, home, park or practice. We've created a new twist for all your catering needs, keeping detail in mind. If you have an in-house favorite that's not listed here, let us know and we are more than happy to accommodate you!

current_announcement.body: Live local music every Thursday & Friday! And sometimes Saturday...because, football.
